value:
The true hero of the War of Shadows
is Lord Hardin. Without Aurelis, Marth
wouldn't have ever raised his army.

The land of Aurelis belonged to
the plains people. Lord Hardin
reclaimed that pride for us!

I see there are many archers of some
skill here, but I am confident none
can best me in mounted archery.

The secret to the Coyote's Men's
strength is our trust in one another.$k$pVyland takes the front lines, Roshea
watches his back, and Sedgar acts
as my right hand.

I've been tanning leather since I was
a child. The key to quality lies in how
much of the oil and fat you brush off.

I am Wolf, commander of the
Coyote's Men. I've heard a lot about
you from $Nf.

There! Did you see it? That was the
technique of a plainsman of Aurelis!

I am the leader of the knights of
Aurelis. And your head...is mine!

Argh! I cannot allow Lord Hardin
to see me like this!

I'm aware of what this means.
Expect much from me.

I am Wolf, leader of the knights of
Aurelis. We are none other than the
Coyote's Men.$k$pNow, prepare to witness how
people of the plains fight!

Aurelis belonged to the people of the
plains...and then the Archaneans
arrived and claimed it was theirs.$k$pWe were told that some man from
another country was our king and
were expected to simply fall in line.$k$pI do not know what kind of person
the king truly is, but I do know this:
He is not one of us.$k$pAnd with a frail body like that...
Perhaps even he could sense he
would never be able to lead us.$k$pBut his younger brother, Lord
Hardin... He proved his strength to
us and earned our respect!$k$pHis future...is surely bright, isn't it,
$Nu?$k$p...No, forget I asked. I am Wolf, of the
Coyote's Men. For now, my duty is to
fight alongside you on the battlefield.
でやっ
討つ！
ぐっ…
何っ…！？
Your head is mine!
I'll go it alone.
Never forget.
I won't abandon him!
Coyote...
Hmph
I'm Wolf—leader of the Coyote's Men.
Stop fooling around.

Sedgar can always calm me down.
That's a talent I appreciate.
I will die at Lord Hardin's side. I made a vow.
Dying at Adria Pass would have been so much easier...
The life Lord Hardin gave me...must fulfill its purpose.
I won't abandon you.
Ready.
Come on.
No matter what.
